meaningInfo: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>master</radical>s gets to choose the place they <kanji>dwell</kanji>. So they <kanji>reside</kanji> in a huge mansion on the top of the mountain, surrounded by all the other masters in their smaller dwellings.
readingMnemonic: Picture the leader master who dwells in a big, beautiful dwelling. Everyone else is jealous.
readingInfo: She needs this big place to <kanji>dwell</kanji> so she has somewhere to store all of her <reading>jew</reading>els (<ja>じゅう</ja>). Masters always have lots of fancy, expensive things, and she has jewels.
